project.name: UDP Client Data Example
project.description: A Java Activity that contacts a remote UDP server and sends data to the server when the activity activates and deactivates.

property.name: space.comm.udp.server.host
property.description: The DNS name or IP address for the UDP server to be contacted. The default is localhost.

property.name: space.comm.udp.server.port
property.description: The network port for the UDP server to be contacted.
